https://tmrev.io/movie/474627-Drácula Barcelona 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sQRHbxI5jJaAZwdaveV3vNWRoKb.jpg In 1969, Jesús Franco and Christopher Lee shot Count Dracula in Barcelona. At the same time, Pere Portabella became aware of this filming, vampirizing it in Cuadecuc, Vampir. Genre and Art-house films had never been so close. Drácula Barcelona tells the story of these two movies. Drácula Barcelona
